headline: VARIAN ROTARY VANE MECHANICAL VACUUM PUMP 15.9 CFM
description: Two Stage Mechanical Vacuum Pump        Once sold, all mechanical vacuum pumps will be rebuilt to factory specifications, unless stated otherwise.  All rebuilt pumps are sold with a one year warranty on parts and labor.  Pumps can be ordered Fomblin® or standard hydrocarbon oil prepped.  Varian SD-450
keywords: mechanical vacuum pump backing pump roughing pump two stage pump
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Rotary Vane Pumps
specstable:
Manufacturer Varian
Model SD-450
Pumping Speed 15.9 CFM (449.3 l/m)
Ultimate Pressure 3.00E-3(En) torr (4.00E-3 mbar)
Inlet Flange KF 25.0 mm (0.984 in)
Exhaust Flange KF 25.0 mm (0.984 in)
Two-Stage YES
Motor Horsepower 3/4 HP
Other Information Partial ultimate pressure: 10E-4 Torr (oil dependant)

Power Requirements 115/ 230 V 10.8 A 5.4 A(2) 60 Hz 1 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 6.500 in (16.5 cm)
Depth 21.570 in (54.8 cm)
Height 9.830 in (25.0 cm)
